Description: Featuring aromas of roses and pine needles with hints of spice and tobacco
It offers an aroma of blueberry pie, blackberries, Asian spices and forest floor with a hint of chocolate
A creamy and flavourful medium-bodied wine, it’s full and well-rounded with plenty of intense, fruity notes
A range of firm, deep and rich flavours like spring flowers, graphite, creme de cassis, kirsch and liquorice
Combines rich and silky tannins with notes of dark fruit, spice, sweet tobacco and black cherry
